scripts.prebuild: npm run prebuild-gen-protocols --silent && npm run prebuild-gen-imports --silent && npm run prebuild-cache-config --silent
scripts.deploy:prod: export NODE_OPTIONS=--max-old-space-size=6144 && export NODE_ENV=prod && npm run deploy:env
scripts.clear-cache: export HISTORICAL=true && export AWS_REGION='eu-central-1' && export tableName='prod-table' && npx ts-node --logError --transpile-only  src/cli/clearProtocolCache.ts
scripts.fillOld: export HISTORICAL=true && export AWS_REGION='eu-central-1' && export tableName='prod-table' && npx ts-node --logError --transpile-only  src/cli/fillOld.ts
scripts.fillOldChain: export HISTORICAL=true && export AWS_REGION='eu-central-1' && export tableName='prod-table' && npx ts-node --logError --transpile-only  src/cli/fillOldChain.ts
scripts.fillLast: export AWS_REGION='eu-central-1' && export tableName='prod-table' && npx ts-node --logError --transpile-only  src/cli/fillLast.ts
scripts.delete-tvl: export AWS_REGION='eu-central-1' && export tableName='prod-table' && npx ts-node --logError src/cli/deleteTvl.ts
scripts.displayData: export AWS_REGION='eu-central-1' && export tableName='prod-table' && npx ts-node --logError src/cli/displayData.ts
scripts.customFill: export AWS_REGION='eu-central-1' && export tableName='prod-table' && npx ts-node --logError src/cli/customFill.ts
scripts.update-metadata-file: node -e "console.log('Deprecated: not used in long time')"
scripts.task-tvl: export AWS_REGION='eu-central-1' && export tableName='prod-table' && NODE_OPTIONS="--max-old-space-size=10144" npx ts-node --logError --transpile-only src/storeTvlTask.ts
scripts.store-chain-assets: export AWS_REGION='eu-central-1' && export tableName='prod-table' && npx ts-node --logError src/storeChainAssets.ts
scripts.override-chain-assets: export AWS_REGION='eu-central-1' && export tableName='prod-table' && npx ts-node --logError src/overrideChainAssets.ts
scripts.store-chain-asset-historical-flows: export AWS_REGION='eu-central-1' && export tableName='prod-table' && npx ts-node --logError src/storeChainAssetFlows.ts
scripts.store-emissions: export AWS_REGION='eu-central-1' && export tableName='prod-table' && npx ts-node --logError src/storeEmissions.ts
scripts.store-emissions-index: export AWS_REGION='eu-central-1' && export tableName='prod-table' && npx ts-node --logError src/storeEmissionsIndex.ts
scripts.run-local: export AWS_REGION='eu-central-1' && export tableName='prod-table' && npx ts-node --logError --transpile-only src/runLocalTVL.ts
scripts.cron-dimensions: export AWS_REGION='eu-central-1' && export tableName='prod-table' && npx  --node-options='--max-old-space-size=20144' ts-node --logError --transpile-only src/api2/cron-task/dimensions.ts
scripts.dimensions-store-all: npx  --node-options='--max-old-space-size=30144' ts-node --logError --transpile-only src/adaptors/handlers/storeAdaptorData/storeAll.ts  2>&1 | tee dimensionsRun.log; node src/api2/scripts/dimensions/printDimensionRunStats.js  2>&1 | tee dimensionsRunStats2.log
scripts.fillOld-dimensions-interactive: npm run prebuild; npx ts-node --logError --transpile-only src/cli/interactive-dimensions.ts
scripts.ui-tool: npm run prebuild; cd ui-tool; npm run start-server
